groups.name: binocular.arangodb
groups.description: Configuration for the gix (Rust Git implementation) indexer.

properties.name: binocular.arangodb.database.name
properties.description: Name of the database to use

properties.name: binocular.arangodb.database.host
properties.description: Host of where the database is running

properties.name: binocular.arangodb.database.port
properties.description: Port of where the database is running

properties.name: binocular.arangodb.database.user
properties.description: User to login with into the ArangoDB instance

properties.name: binocular.arangodb.database.password
properties.description: Password to login with into the ArangoDB instance
